attributes.action: Do not close the Mother and Baby Unit at Queens Campus NUH Trust
attributes.additional_details: Admission to unit cannot meet demand . Women have issues both antenatal and postnatally.
attributes.background: Dr Margaret Oates who sits on MBBRACE panel, started the immensely important work of perinatal mental psychiatry in the 1980. The unit has developed into a tertiary centre for women who will survive this temporary condition but only with expert help.
